public interface UserClient

    • findAllBasicUser

      @GetMapping("/users/basics") @ResponseStatus(OK) java.util.List<Basic> findAllBasicUser()
      Find All Basic Users
      Returns:
      a list of Basic

    • findBasicUserById

      @GetMapping("/users/basics/{id}") @ResponseStatus(OK) Basic findBasicUserById​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Long basicId)
      Find basic user by id
      Parameters:
      basicId - receives a Long with Basic's Id
      Returns:
      a Basic user

    • updateBasicRoomId

      @PatchMapping("/users/basics/update-room/{id}/{roomId}") @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) void updateBasicRoomId​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Long basicId, @PathVariable("roomId") java.lang.Integer roomId)
      Update Basic Room Id
      Parameters:
      basicId - receives a Long with Basic's Id
      roomId - receives an Integer with Room's Id

      Parameters:
